To these considerations the following must also be taken into account. Instead of transferring to his pages paragraphs ‘ from Wyclif bodily, Huss might easily have introduced into them words of his own or taken the meaning and re-expressed it in his own language. That he did not pursue* this method is evidence that he had no intention of using the garments of his great teacher to make a reputation for himself.
